# CleanTerminus
Crossplatform terminal clean command for Python

# Installation  

```
pip install cleanterminus
```

or  

```
git clone https://github.com/demensdeum/CleanTerminus.git  
cd CleanTerminus  
pip install .  (there is dot at the end)
```

# Usage

```
import cleanterminus
cleanterminus.clean()
```

or  

```
=======
cleanterminus.clear()
```
